column4: Inbound Richmond Rd between Yorkshire Blvd and N Eagle Creek Dr
column5: Single vehicle off the roadway.  Police on scene in the right turn lane.

column4: UPDATE:  Inner loop New Circle Rd between Tates Creek Rd and Nicholasville Rd
column5: All lanes are back open.  Traffic remains backed up past Alumni Dr.  Use added caution while traffic flow returns to normal.

column4: Rosemont Garden at Southland Dr / Lafayette Pkwy
column5: Intersection closed at least thru Friday 2/3 due to a 16" water main break and damaged communication lines.
